summary: A website for an anime/story world featuring clans (Moon, Fire, Earth, Sun) and characters. Admins can manage characters via an admin panel.
architectural_notes: Site involves clan-based characters (Moon, Fire, Earth, Sun clans) with an admin panel for character management

existing_features.title: Update the CharactersPanel admin UI to allow adding multiple characters in a single session. The modal form should support adding and removing multiple character entries before submitting, so all entries are saved at once with a single submit action.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add characters page with: Kazeyori Shiranagi (Moon Clan), Sankei Enshiro (Fire Clan), Haruna Hishigawa (Earth Clan), Iwagami Sekien (Moon Clan), Aurelian (Sun Clan) with their descriptions
Admin panel: allow admins to create multiple characters at once (bulk character creation)
Update the backend character creation API to accept and persist an array of characters in a single call, so admins can create multiple characters at once.
